events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund because it doesn’t fit properly and I’m not satisfied with the size.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund inquiry related to incorrect sizing.
Assigning the refund case to the returns specialist team for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to process a refund for your jacket due to sizing issues.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or if the tags are still attached?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and the original tags are still intact.
Thanks for the info. You are eligible for a full refund. Please use the prepaid return label we will email to you shortly.
Great, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and will send the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your full refund. It should appear on your statement within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was credited successfully. Please let us know if there’s anything else we can help with.
Closing this support case as the refund issue has been fully resolved and confirmed by the customer.
